reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Health Accelerator Programme: re-balancing primary healthcare policy in Recife

description.narrative: This project will support reform of primary care services in the city of Recife, improving access, responsiveness, quality and range of services, to make healthcare in Brazil more cost-effective and also attractive to foreign investment. This is through supporting local commissioners and clinicians by bringing together data collected in the city of Recife to accelerate the development of unplanned / urgent care services so that citizens can have their care provided locally.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
